newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.AFRICA'S MAKRO TO OPEN 60 MILLION RAND STORE.
newsitem.headline: S.AFRICA'S MAKRO TO OPEN 60 MILLION RAND STORE.

text.p: Liquor, food and general merchandising store Makro will open a 60 million rand store in Port Elizabeth on Wednesday bringing its stores in South Africa to 11, the company said on Tuesday.
Makro managing director Joe Owens said the store occupied 11,000 square meters and the 60 million rand included opening stock.
"Land, buildings, equipment, and opening stock will top 60 million rand to give Port Elizabeth citizens and adjacent areas the best in modern efficient and secure shopping," he said in a statement.
Makro is celebrating 25 years in South Africa this month and contributes over 2.5 billion rand to Wooltru Ltd's Massmart Holdings' annual turnover.
